text: Mahlagha Mallah (; 21 September 1917 – 8 November 2021) was an Iranian librarian and environmental activist. She founded the Women's Society Against Environmental Pollution. She was known as the "Mother of Iran's Environment". Mallah died on 8 November 2021 in Tehran, aged 104.مه‌لقا ملاح درگذشت ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Iranian writers Category:Iranian environmentalists Category:Iranian centenarians
title: Mahlagha Mallah
